REMEMBERING CHRISTOPHER: Today marks the 20-year anniversary of one of the coldest and most gruesome homicide cases in Kankakee County history.  Ten-year-old Christopher Meyer was kidnapped and brutally murdered by Timothy Buss.  Buss was later sentenced to life imprisonment after having his death sentence overturned.  We applaud Christopher‚Äôs mother, Mika Moulton, for her life-long dedication to strengthening laws and educating and protecting our youth.  May he rest in Peace.  We will never forget!
